Operation 'getPlaylists' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Current description relies on external reference (listennotes.com/listen) which lacks clarity for AI agents. Missing details about authentication requirement, playlist types, and what metadata is returned. Improved description clarifies authentication context, pagination mechanism, and playlist composition.

data.current_summary: Fetch a list of your playlists.
data.current_description:
This endpoint returns same data as listennotes.com/listen under your account.
You can use the **page** parameter to do pagination and fetch more playlists.
data.description_suggestion: Fetch all playlists created by the authenticated user. Returns a paginated list of playlists with their metadata. Use the **page** parameter to paginate through results. Each playlist can contain episodes or podcasts and may be public, unlisted, or private.
data.reasoning: Current description relies on external reference (listennotes.com/listen) which lacks clarity for AI agents. Missing details about authentication requirement, playlist types, and what metadata is returned. Improved description clarifies authentication context, pagination mechanism, and playlist composition.

message: Operation 'getPodcastAudience' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Current description uses numbered list format that is less clear for AI interpretation. Lacks explicit statement about what is returned and data availability constraints. Improved description uses standard prose format, clarifies return value structure, and explicitly states data limitations for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Fetch audience demographics for a podcast
data.current_description: Fetch audience demographics for a podcast - 1) directly measured on the Listen Notes platform; 2) only supports audience breakdown by regions for now; 3) not every podcast has data.
data.description_suggestion: Fetch audience demographic data for a podcast measured on the Listen Notes platform. Returns regional audience breakdown when available. Note: data availability varies by podcast; not all podcasts have demographic information. Currently supports regional breakdown only.
data.reasoning: Current description uses numbered list format that is less clear for AI interpretation. Lacks explicit statement about what is returned and data availability constraints. Improved description uses standard prose format, clarifies return value structure, and explicitly states data limitations for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'justListen' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Current description is too informal and lacks actionable details. It doesn't clearly explain what data is returned or how an AI agent should interpret the response. Improved description specifies the selection bias, clarifies the return value structure, and explains the operation's purpose for better AI agent usability.

data.current_description: Recently published episodes are more likely to be fetched. Good luck!
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a random podcast episode from the Listen Notes database, with preference for recently published episodes. Returns a complete episode object including audio URL, metadata, and associated podcast information. Useful for discovery and serendipitous content exploration.
data.reasoning: Current description is too informal and lacks actionable details. It doesn't clearly explain what data is returned or how an AI agent should interpret the response. Improved description specifies the selection bias, clarifies the return value structure, and explains the operation's purpose for better AI agent usability.

message: Operation 'getPodcastRecommendations' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Current description is minimal and lacks context about the recommendation algorithm and response structure. Improved description clarifies the input requirement (podcast ID), explains the recommendation basis, specifies the return format and included fields, and provides use case context for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Fetch up to 8 podcast recommendations based on the given podcast id.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves up to 8 podcast recommendations based on a given podcast ID. Uses similarity algorithms to identify related podcasts. Returns an array of podcast objects with basic metadata including title, description, listen score, and artwork. Useful for podcast discovery and related content suggestions.
data.reasoning: Current description is minimal and lacks context about the recommendation algorithm and response structure. Improved description clarifies the input requirement (podcast ID), explains the recommendation basis, specifies the return format and included fields, and provides use case context for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'getEpisodeRecommendations' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Current description is too minimal and lacks context about the recommendation methodology and response structure. Improved description clarifies the input requirement (episode ID), explains the recommendation basis, specifies the return format with relevant fields, and provides use case context for AI agent interpretation.

data.current_description: Fetch up to 8 episode recommendations based on the given episode id.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves up to 8 episode recommendations based on a given episode ID. Uses similarity algorithms to identify related episodes. Returns an array of episode objects with metadata including title, description, audio URL, duration, and associated podcast information. Useful for episode discovery and content recommendations.
data.reasoning: Current description is too minimal and lacks context about the recommendation methodology and response structure. Improved description clarifies the input requirement (episode ID), explains the recommendation basis, specifies the return format with relevant fields, and provides use case context for AI agent interpretation.

message: Operation 'deletePodcastById' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary 'Request to delete a podcast' is vague and doesn't clarify the asynchronous review process. Description is verbose and unclear about required inputs. Improved summary emphasizes the review process. Improved description clarifies required inputs (podcast id), expected outputs (status field values), and optional webhook configuration for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Podcast hosting services can use this endpoint to streamline the process of podcast deletion on behave of their users (podcasters). We will review the deletion request within 12 hours. If the podcast is already deleted, the "status" field in the response will be "deleted". Otherwise, the status field will be "in review". If you want to get a notification once the podcast is deleted, you can configure a webhook url in the dashboard: listennotes.com/api/dashboard/#webhooks
data.summary_suggestion: Submit podcast deletion request for review
data.description_suggestion: Submit a podcast deletion request on behalf of podcasters. The deletion request will be reviewed within 12 hours. Returns a response with a "status" field indicating either "deleted" (if already deleted) or "in review" (if pending review). Requires podcast id as input. Optional: configure a webhook URL in the dashboard to receive notifications when the deletion is completed.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Request to delete a podcast' is vague and doesn't clarify the asynchronous review process. Description is verbose and unclear about required inputs. Improved summary emphasizes the review process. Improved description clarifies required inputs (podcast id), expected outputs (status field values), and optional webhook configuration for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'getEpisodeById' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is too minimal and doesn't explain what metadata is returned or when to use this endpoint versus batch operations. Enhanced description specifies return fields and use cases for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Fetch detailed meta data for an episode by id
data.current_description: Fetch detailed meta data for a specific episode.
data.description_suggestion: Fetch comprehensive metadata for a specific episode by episode id. Returns detailed episode information including audio URL, duration, publication date, transcript availability, and associated podcast information. Use this endpoint when you need complete episode details beyond basic metadata.

message: Operation 'search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary 'Full-text search' is too generic. Description lacks clarity on what is returned. Enhanced summary to specify searchable content types, and expanded description to clarify return values and plan-specific limitations for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
Full-text search on episodes, podcasts, or curated lists of podcasts.
Use the `offset` parameter to paginate through search results.
The FREE plan allows to see up to 30 search results (or `offset` < 30) per query.
The PRO plan allows to see up to 300 search results (or `offset` < 300) per query.
The ENTERPRISE plan allows to see up to 10,000 search results (or `offset` < 10000) per query.
data.summary_suggestion: Search episodes, podcasts, and curated lists
data.description_suggestion: Perform full-text search across episodes, podcasts, and curated podcast lists. Supports pagination via the `offset` parameter with plan-dependent limits: FREE plan (up to 30 results), PRO plan (up to 300 results), ENTERPRISE plan (up to 10,000 results). Returns matching podcasts and episodes with metadata including listen scores, artwork, and RSS feeds (PRO/ENTERPRISE only).
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Full-text search' is too generic. Description lacks clarity on what is returned. Enhanced summary to specify searchable content types, and expanded description to clarify return values and plan-specific limitations for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Fetch a list of best podcasts by genre
data.current_description:
Get a list of curated best podcasts by genre,
which are curated by Listen Notes staffs based on various signals from the Internet, e.g.,
top charts on other podcast platforms, recommendations from mainstream media,
user activities on listennotes.com...
You can get the genre ids from `GET /genres` endpoint.
This endpoint returns same data as https://www.listennotes.com/best-podcasts/
data.summary_suggestion: Get curated best podcasts by genre
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve curated lists of the best podcasts organized by genre. Results are curated by Listen Notes staff based on multiple signals including top charts from other platforms, mainstream media recommendations, and user activity on ListenNotes.com. Requires a genre ID (obtainable from the GET /genres endpoint). Returns podcast metadata including listen scores, artwork, and descriptions.
